alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 1:41PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay, central Walton, Holmes and Washington Counties through 230 PM EDT/130 PM CDT/... At 141 PM EDT/1241 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles southwest of Geneva to 7 miles southeast of De Funiak Springs to near Santa Rosa Beach. Movement was east at 30 mph. At 1235 PM CDT the Walton County High School reported a wind gust of 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds between 30 and 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Chipley, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Union, Live Oak, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Wausau, Westville, Ebro, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Blue Mountain Beach, Gritney and Seaside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
